lead_paragraph: In his book "Grand Prix Circuits," the journalist Maurice Hamilton tells the story of each of the 71 tracks that have ever hosted a Formula One Grand Prix.

headline.main: Exploring the World’s Racetracks, Past and Present
headline.print_headline: Exploring the World's Racetracks, Past and Present

snippet: In his book "Grand Prix Circuits," the journalist Maurice Hamilton tells the story of each of the 71 tracks that have ever hosted a Formula One Grand Prix.
